76023.「ここは 三門の関所です。\n この門の向こうには 勇者姫アンルシアさまが\n:
This is the Three Way Gate. Beyond this gate
is Gran Zedora Castle, where Hero Princess
Anlucia resides.

76024.「ここは 三門の関所だ。\n この扉から出て コニウェア平原を抜けると\n ココ:
This is the Three Way Gate. If you exit
through this gate and go through Coniware
Plain, you will reach Cocolata Beach.

76025.「この グランゼドーラ王国への門は 常に\n すべての者たちのために 開放されて:
The gates to this Gran Zedora Kingdom are
always open to all.

76026.「レンダーシアには グランゼドーラ王国の他に\n メルサンディ村 セレドの町 そ:
In addition to Gran Zedora Kingdom, there are three other towns in Lendersia: Melsandy Village Town of Celed and Kingdom of Al-
Ahagiro. All of them are peaceful and beautiful. If you have business in any of these three towns, you can go out through this
door.
